GSD.product_version: versions from v5.8 to before v5.10.163
GSD.description:
padata: Always leave BHs disabled when running ->parallel()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.163 by commit 8e0681dd4eee029eb1d533d06993f7cb091efb73, it was introduced in version v5.8 by commit 4611ce22468895acd61fee9ac1da810d60617d9a. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: padata: Always leave BHs disabled when running ->parallel()
